title: Spicy King Prawns with Tomato Relish
directions: Home Perfect Prawns Recipes Spicy King Prawns with Tomato Relish
Spicy King Prawns with Tomato Relish
Start by making the the relish: combine all the ingredients in a bowl, toss lightly and set aside for 20 minutes to allow the flavours to develop.
Combine the harissa paste, extra virgin olive oil and lemon juice and spoon over the cut side of the prawns.
Preheat your grill or BBQ, then grill the prawns for a couple of minutes, turning once. Serve with the tomato relish.
ingredients: Start by making the the relish: combine all the ingredients in a bowl, toss lightly and set aside for 20 minutes to allow the flavours to develop.
Combine the harissa paste, extra virgin olive oil and lemon juice and spoon over the cut side of the prawns.
Preheat your grill or BBQ, then grill the prawns for a couple of minutes, turning once. Serve with the tomato relish.
16 whole king prawns, split open and deveined
